content.question: Why did Miku send e-mail message #2 ?

choices.label: To get directions to a new location
To ask for help remembering something
To share information about using a new app
To request more time for a project

content.answer: To ask for help remembering something

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Interpret the distinguishing features of a text.
